body:
Package for command line tools for Amazon Web Services. Also 5 other packages it requires which were not already in Spack.  

I have tried to put in all the version restrictions contained in all the various setup.py and requirements.txt files associated with these packages. A few of the single-version requirements seemed overly restrictive, so I have left out a few, but may well be proven wrong in the end. It was a bit of a nightmare to track through......

If anyone thinks the main package should not have the leading "py-" I am open to changing that. I just went with what Spack wanted to call it.
title: newpackage: py-awscli (and dependencies)
